rooms.name: Majestic Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: An expansive foyer that welcomes guests, featuring traditional Chettinad motifs and rich woodwork. Vastu considerations: positioned in the North-West for auspicious entry.

rooms.name: Guest Lounge
rooms.description: A comfortable lounge area with ambient lighting, large windows to let natural light in. Vastu orientation: South-East to balance energies.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An elegant dining space adjoining the lounge. Traditional carvings and open design facilitate social interaction. Vastu: North-East for prosperity.

rooms.name: Open Courtyard/Garden
rooms.description: Central courtyard with landscaped garden, enhancing natural ventilation and positive energy flow. Includes a water feature in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: Accessible guest toilet near the entrance for convenience.

rooms.name: Service Area
rooms.description: Space designated for utilities, storage and cleaning supplies. Positioned away from main living spaces.

additional_features.description: An exclusive swimming pool designed within a dedicated section of the garden. Positioned in the North-East to harness positive energy.
A well-equipped private gym located adjacent to the main living area, accessible from an interior corridor on the ground floor for ease of use and privacy.
